roleset.name: to make an itemized list of, classify,
roleset.note: CATALOG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'catalog' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from catalog.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: catalogue itself, or category arg1 is placed in

example.name: transitive
example.text: They pause only [*-1] to register little whimpers of distress and sighs of satisfaction , like tourists cataloging the sights [0]they 've seen [*T*-2] from the window of a bus .
example.arg: the sights [0] they 've seen [*T*-2]from the window of a bus

example.name: Simple transitive, astronomy
example.text: In nine years, she catalogued more than 10000 stars.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: He catalogued the unsolicited manuscripts into bundles of 50 or 100.
